truths: What is the most embarrassing thing that has ever happened to you in public?
dares: Act like a chicken and cluck around the room for one minute.

truths: Have you ever lied to get out of trouble? What was the situation?
dares: Do your best impression of a celebrity of the group's choice.
Take a selfie with the most ridiculous face you can make and post it on social media.

truths: Have you ever cheated on a test or exam? If so, how did you do it?
dares: Call a random contact and sing them "Happy Birthday".

truths: What is the weirdest dream you've ever had?
dares: Do 10 push-ups or sit-ups in the middle of the room.

truths: Have you ever had a crush on someone who turned out to be in a relationship?
dares: Go outside and shout "I love [name of someone in the group]" as loudly as you can.

truths: What is the most ridiculous thing you've done to impress someone you liked?
dares: Wear socks on your hands for the next two rounds of the game.

truths: What is your most embarrassing nickname, and how did you get it?
dares: Speak in an accent of the group's choice for the next three turns.

truths: Have you ever snooped through someone else's phone or belongings without their permission?
dares: Text your crush and confess your love for them.

truths: What is the most childish thing you still do as an adult?
dares: Do a handstand for as long as you can.
